Package models

Class PlatformController

java.lang.Object
models.PlatformController
public class PlatformController extends Object
Contains all the logic of the platform.
Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • PlatformController

      public PlatformController​(String name, String nit)
      Constructor of the platform controller
      Parameters:
      name - name of the platform
      nit - enterprise nit

  • Method Details

    • updateAudio

      public boolean updateAudio​(Audio anyAudio, int playTime)
      Updates and audio in Producer and Platform list when it's played
      Parameters:
      anyAudio - audio to be updated
      playTime - the seconds the audio was played
      Returns:
      true if is updated, else false

    • addUser

      public String addUser​(User user)
      Adds a user to Platform's list
      Parameters:
      user - user object to be added
      Returns:
      Confirmation message if added, else error message

    • createUser

      public User createUser​(String id, String nickname, String name, String imgURL, int typeUser1, int typeUser2)
      Creates a user depending on the type
      Parameters:
      id - id for the user
      nickname - nickname if the user is consumer
      name - name if the user is producer
      imgURL - Url of the image that represents them if producer
      typeUser1 - type of user, 1 being consumer, 2 being Producer
      typeUser2 - subtype of user, 1 being Artist for producer or Standard for Consumer, 2 being Content creator for producer or Premium for Consumer
      Returns:
      User created

    • createAudio

      public Audio createAudio​(String name, String imgURL, int duration, String album, double price, String description, int genre, int audioType, String author)
      Creates and audio depending on the type
      Parameters:
      name - name of the audio
      imgURL - url that represents the audio
      duration - duration in seconds of the audio
      album - name of the album if song
      price - price of the audio if song
      description - description of the audio if podcast
      genre - option selected for genre if song or category if podcast
      audioType - audio type, 1 being song, 2 being podcast
      author - author of the audio
      Returns:
      Audio created

    • addAudio

      public String addAudio​(Audio audio, String userId)
      Adds and audio to a producer user list
      Parameters:
      audio - Audio to be added
      userId - id of the producer user - it's mandatory to be a producer, else and exception message is thrown
      Returns:
      Confirmation message

    • searchUser

      public User searchUser​(String id)
      Search a user by its id and return the object
      Parameters:
      id - id of the user to be search
      Returns:
      Object of the user, null if isn't found

    • deployUserOptions

      public String[] deployUserOptions​(String id)
      Deploys a message with purchased songs and available podcast from a give user
      Parameters:
      id - id of the user
      Returns:
      two strings, first contains the audios and second is null. First is null if user isn't found, second is an exception if the user is not consumer

    • isSong

      public boolean isSong​(Audio anyAudio)
      Checks if an audio is an instance of Song
      Parameters:
      anyAudio - audio to be checked
      Returns:
      true if song, else false

    • deployPodcast

      public String deployPodcast()
      Deploys sthe podcast available in the platforom
      Returns:
      message with the podcast or an exception if no podcasts are found

    • searcAudio

      public Audio searcAudio​(String audioName)
      Searches an audio by its name
      Parameters:
      audioName - name of the audio
      Returns:
      audio object found or null if is not found

    • createPlaylist

      public boolean createPlaylist​(String name, String userId)
      Creates a playlista nd adds it to a given user
      Parameters:
      name - name of the playlist
      userId - ID of the user
      Returns:
      true if is added else, false

    • showPlaylistSharecode

      public String showPlaylistSharecode​(String listId, String consumerId)
      Shows the share code of a playlist from a given user and displays its matrix
      Parameters:
      listId - id of the playlist
      consumerId - id of the user
      Returns:
      Code and matrix of the playlist - error message if playlist or user doesn't exist

    • printMatrix

      public String printMatrix​(int[][] matrix)
      Prints a given Integer matrix
      Parameters:
      matrix - matrix to be printed
      Returns:
      printed matrix

    • searchPlaylistFromConsumer

      public Playlist searchPlaylistFromConsumer​(String name, User anyUserC)
      Search a playlist from a given user
      Parameters:
      name - name of the playlist
      anyUserC - Consumer User object
      Returns:
      found playlist, else null

    • editPlaylist

      public String editPlaylist​(String playlistName, String audioName, int action, String userName)
      Adds or removes and audio to a given playlist
      Parameters:
      playlistName - name of the playlist
      userName - name of playlist's owner
      audioName - audio to be added or removed
      action - action to be executed, 1 being adding the audio, 2 being remove the audio
      Returns:
      a message if the action is completed or an alert for any exception

    • searchSongFromUser

      public boolean searchSongFromUser​(Audio anySong, User anyUser)
      Checks if a user has bought a song
      Parameters:
      anySong - song to be checjed
      anyUser - user to check the song to
      Returns:
      true if is found, else false

    • deployUserPlaylists

      public String[] deployUserPlaylists​(String id)
      Deploys a message with the created playlist of a given user
      Parameters:
      id - user id
      Returns:
      two Strings, first with the playlists, second null if no playlists are found

    • deployPlaylistAudio

      public String deployPlaylistAudio​(String playName, String userId)

      Parameters:
      playName - playlist name
      userId - user id
      Returns:
      message with the audios in the playlist

      Returns:

      userId - id of the user
      Returns:

      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user
      Returns:
      general report of the platform and stadistics from user if found

    • getAudioPlays

      public int[] getAudioPlays()
      Gets the times podcasts and songs has been played
      Returns:
      two integer, first podcast plays, second song plays

    • getMaxGenre

      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user
      Returns:
      Most played genre, or exception if not consumer

    • playAudio

      public boolean playAudio​(String userId, Audio audio)
      Updates play information after an audio is played
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user that played the audio
      audio - name of the played audio
      Returns:
      true if updated, else false
